languages.text: "Помочь верному служителю Его в борьбе со скверной — священный долг тех, от кого зависят миллионы жизней подданных Империума. "Своим примером да направь тех, кто понесет свет Императора сквозь тысячи звезд".

"To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"
languages.original_text: "Помочь верному служителю Его в борьбе со скверной — священный долг тех, от кого зависят миллионы жизней подданных Империума. "Своим примером да направь тех, кто понесет свет Императора сквозь тысячи звезд".

traits.locale_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

"To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

languages.text: "Seine gläubigen Diener im Kampf gegen die Verderbnis zu unterstützen, ist die heilige Pflicht aller, deren Handeln Millionen von Untertanen des Imperiums betrifft. Lasst Euer Beispiel jenen leuchten, die das Licht des Imperators durch tausend Sterne tragen."
languages.original_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

traits.locale_text: "Seine gläubigen Diener im Kampf gegen die Verderbnis zu unterstützen, ist die heilige Pflicht aller, deren Handeln Millionen von Untertanen des Imperiums betrifft. Lasst Euer Beispiel jenen leuchten, die das Licht des Imperators durch tausend Sterne tragen."

languages.text: « Si vos actions touchent des millions de sujets de l'Imperium, alors vous vous devez d'aider Ses fidèles serviteurs dans le combat contre la corruption. "Laissez votre exemple guider ceux qui porteront la lumière de l'Empereur parmi un millier d'étoiles." »
languages.original_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

traits.locale_text: « Si vos actions touchent des millions de sujets de l'Imperium, alors vous vous devez d'aider Ses fidèles serviteurs dans le combat contre la corruption. "Laissez votre exemple guider ceux qui porteront la lumière de l'Empereur parmi un millier d'étoiles." »

languages.text: “审判庭的工作是协助帝皇忠实的臣民抗击腐化。他们的庄严职责，会影响到帝国亿万臣民的生活。‘愿你成为众人的榜样，指引那些将沐浴在帝皇明光之中，穿越万千星辰的人们。’”
languages.original_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

traits.locale_text: “审判庭的工作是协助帝皇忠实的臣民抗击腐化。他们的庄严职责，会影响到帝国亿万臣民的生活。‘愿你成为众人的榜样，指引那些将沐浴在帝皇明光之中，穿越万千星辰的人们。’”

languages.text: 「その行動が帝国の臣下数百万に影響を及ぼす者にとって、あの方の忠実な下僕の腐敗に対する戦いを援助するのは厳粛なる義務でございます。皇帝陛下の御光を千の星に運ぶ者たち導くべく、模範を示しましょう」
languages.original_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

traits.locale_text: 「その行動が帝国の臣下数百万に影響を及ぼす者にとって、あの方の忠実な下僕の腐敗に対する戦いを援助するのは、厳粛なる義務です。皇帝陛下の御光を千の星に運ぶ者たち導くべく、模範を示しましょう」

languages.text: «Ayudar a Su fiel servidor en la lucha contra la corrupción es el solemne deber de todos aquellos cuyas acciones afectan a millones de súbditos del Imperium. "Que su ejemplo guíe a aquellos que atraviesan el millar de estrellas portando la luz del Emperador"».
languages.original_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

traits.locale_text: «Ayudar a Su fiel servidor en la lucha contra la corrupción es el solemne deber de todos aquellos cuyas acciones afectan a millones de súbditos del Imperium. "Que su ejemplo guíe a aquellos que atraviesan el millar de estrellas portando la luz del Emperador"».

languages.original_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"

languages.text: "Yozlaşma ile mücadelede O'nun sadık hizmetkârına yardım etmek, eylemleri milyonlarca İmparatorluk tebaasını etkileyen herkesin kutsal görevidir. 'İmparator'un ışığını bin yıldıza taşıyacaklara emsal olun'."
languages.original_text: "To aid His faithful servant in the fight against corruption is the solemn duty of all whose actions affect millions of the Imperium's subjects. 'Let your example guide those who will carry the Emperor's light across a thousand stars.'"
